|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8305SC; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:0E:2E |oui = 00:0E:2E |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = iboss-XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^iboss-[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = BR-6204Wg |manuf_rev = v2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/16/2005 |estreldate = 11/2007 |estprice = 129.95 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Realtek;RTL8225; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-00000445-01Z Rev.A" is silkscreened on the board (or at least one board). Per the manual, to reset the device to factory defaults... *power off the unit *reconnect the power *upon connecting the power, wait for the power LED to start blinking, then wait for the power LED to go solid *hold the reset button for 15 seconds *release power button *wait for up to 3 min The FCC ID on the device label is NDD9562040507.. but it would seem that it should instead be NDD9562040608 (the FCC ID of the v2, which shares the same silkscreened text on the board). The '''phantom-334455''' SSID would seem to be relevant to this device.. ==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.org/web/20071219174809/http://www.iphantom.com/iBossHomeProductResidential.html Product page (via archive.org)]
